constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of a first and second floor side extension, raising of roof height including side dormer and installation of 3no. front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposed development, by reason of its height and roof form, would result in a wholly incongruous and unduly prominent feature within the Rowlls Road street scene and have an unacceptably detrimental impact on the character and appearance of the area. The proposal would therefore be contrary to Policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
Condition 3 (Materials) - Officers have reviewed the information submitted and are satisfied this is acceptable.
